    • Method Detail

      • defend

        int defend(Node from,
         Node to,
         int num)
        Description copied from class: Player
        To be implemented by each individual AI. This function should contain the AI's logic for deciding how many units to use when defending against an attack.
        Specified by:
        defend in class Player
        Parameters:
        from - The node the attack is originating from.
        to - The node the attack is being made towards.
        num - The number of units being used to attack.
        Returns:
        The number of units being used to defend.

      • occupy

        int occupy(Node from,
         Node to)
        Description copied from class: Player
        To be implemented by each individual AI. This function should contain the AI's logic for deciding how many units to move into a new node that is gained from a successful attack.
        Specified by:
        occupy in class Player
        Parameters:
        from - The node the units are moving from.
        to - The node the units are moving to.
        Returns:
        The number of units to move.

      • place

        Node place()
        Description copied from class: Player
        To be implemented by each individual AI. This function should contain the AI's logic for deciding where to place new units. It should be able to function in all of these conditions: no units in any of the nodes, units in some of the nodes, and units in all of the nodes.
        Specified by:
        place in class Player
        Returns:
        The node where the unit should be placed.

      • turn

        void turn()
        Description copied from class: Player
        To be implemented by each individual AI. This function should contain the AI's actual decision-making process. The player should never call this function by itself; it will always be called externally.
        Specified by:
        turn in class Player
